character.noteList: Warforged Features: • Disease doesn't affect you, you resist poison and gain adv vs poisoned, you don't - breathe, sleep, eat or drink • You can't move but are otherwise conscious during long rests and they take only six hours • Armor works differently for you and your AC increases by 1 (see rules) Soldier Feature: • You have influence within your former army/organization Artificer Features: • As an action, use tools to give a tiny object a visual, auditory, or olfactory effect (see rules). • You learn four infusions which you can use on two objects at once (see rules). • You can take an hour to make a set of artisan's tools (see rules) • Artificer Archetype: Battle Smith • Your magic weapon attacks can use Int for attack/damage • You can create a magical construct to protect you (see rules) ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields ⊠Simple Weapons Martial Weapons ⊠One tool proficiency One type of gaming set Vehicles (land) Thieves' Tools Tinker's Tools One Artisan's Tools Smith's Supplies ⊠Common One Languages ⊠studded leather armor mace crossbow, light light crossbow bolts (20) thieves' tools dungeoneer's pack rank insignia trophy set of bone dice OR deck of cards set of common clothes belt pouch ⊠⊠Artificer 3⊠Warforged⊠Soldier⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Doc⊠Artificer 3⊠10⊠10⊠0⊠247⊠0⊠0
